jmap_send_email.description:
Send email from account. Compose and deliver immediately.

    Creates and sends email in one operation. Use account parameter
    to send from specific address when multiple accounts exist.

    Args:
        params: JmapSendEmailInput containing:
            - account: Send from this account (optional)
            - to: List of recipient addresses (required)
            - subject: Email subject (required)
            - body: Plain text body (required)
            - cc: CC recipients (optional)
            - bcc: BCC recipients (optional)
            - in_reply_to: Message-ID for threading (optional)

    Returns:
        Confirmation with sent email ID.
